portrait_l.name: roche
portrait_l.sjis: なんだかはぐれが さわがしくなったみたいだけど 無事に帰ってきてね
portrait_l.ascii: It looks like the Strays have become more active, but Come back safely.

portrait_l.name: thuss
portrait_l.ascii: I'm counting on you to help my daughter.

dialogue.info:
ここから先は乙女の秘密 立ち入り禁止！！ ティエ
The rest is a girl's secret. No trespassing. Tier.
# Not so sure how to translate the second line. I feel like I need more context.

portrait_l.name: woman
portrait_l.sjis: お休みもらってここに来たんだけど 正解だったみたいね いろんな意味で
portrait_l.ascii: I came here for my break, but it looks like I hit the jackpot.

portrait_l.name: elderly
portrait_l.sjis: 何やら良くない事が起きそうじゃ
portrait_l.ascii: I feel like something bad is going to happen
